results.title: [Changes in cardiac renin-angiotensin system after severe burn injury in rats].
results.journal: Zhonghua Zheng Xing Shao Shang Wai Ke Za Zhi
results.text_hl: METHODS: @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ were divided into three groups: control group (n = 8, without @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burns@@@), @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burn@@@ group (n = 40, 30% TBSA full-thickness @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burns@@@), and treatment group (n = 40, gavage @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ for 3 days before 30% TBSA @<m>DISEASE_Burns</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002056 @@@burns@@@).
